dmca.title: Notice ID: 163-27061Notice of Unauthorized Use of The McGraw-Hill Companies Property
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: aap-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
[mailto:aap-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 26, 2007 4:54 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Notice ID: 163-27061Notice of Unauthorized Use of The
McGraw-Hill Companies Property

* PGP Signed: 01/26/07 at 16:53:39

26 Jan 2007 00:40:36 GMT
163-27061

Theplanet.Com Internet Services

USA

Dear Sir or Madam:

The McGraw-Hill Companies and its affiliated companies are the exclusive
owners of copyrights and other intellectual proprietary rights in
numerous assets including the work(s) below.  Unauthorized copying and
distribution constitute copyright infringement under applicable National
laws and various International Treaties.  

Evidentiary Information:
Notice ID: 27061
Asset: Hacking Exposed 3rd Edition
Protocol: eDonkey
IP Address:  69.56.188.226
DNS: e2.bc.3845.static.theplanet.com
File Name: Mcgraw-Hill - Hacking Exposed, 3Rd Ed - Hacking Exposed Win2K
- Hacking Linux Exposed (Book Excerpts, 260 Pages) - 2001 - (By
Laxxuss).pdf File Size: 6135740
Timestamp: 20 Jan 2007 09:11:36 GMT
Last Seen Date: 20 Jan 2007 09:11:36 GMT
URL: ed2k://|file|Mcgraw-Hill - Hacking Exposed, 3Rd Ed - Hacking
Exposed Win2K - Hacking Linux Exposed (Book Excerpts, 260 Pages) - 2001
- (By Laxxuss).pdf|6135740|4ED6A3A81A5E5CC5DD961E4E4CE17C8C|/
Username (if available): 


 
It has come to our attention that Theplanet.Com Internet Services is the
provider for the IP/DNS listed below, from which unauthorized use of The
McGraw-Hill Companies property(ies) listed below is taking place. We
believe that the Internet access of this infringement is provided by
Theplanet.Com Internet Services or a downstream service provider who
purchases this connectivity from your Organization.

Although various legal and equitable remedies may be available to The
McGraw-Hill Companies as a result of such infringement, The McGraw-Hill
Companies believes that the entire Internet community can and will
benefit, when these matters are resolved cooperatively.  We urge you to
take immediate action to stop the unauthorized use, including but not
limited to:

(1) Taking appropriate action against the account holder under your
Abuse Policy/Terms of Service.
(2) Notifying the account holder of this infringement;
(3) Requesting the account holder to remove (delete) the infringing
material;
(4) Disabling access to the infringing material

Please respond indicating the actions you have applied to resolve this
matter. Without any delay, the provided link has been assigned to this
matter.
 
http://webreply.baytsp.com/webreply/webreply.jsp?customerid=163&commhash
=49c0aab5065bd2525c2fad468442307a (if unable to access please copy and
paste into your browers) Email correspondence; please reference the
above Notice ID 163-27061and matter, the subject line. 
mailto:aap@copyright-compliance.com?subject=RE%3A%20Notice%20ID%3A%20163
%2D27061Notice%20of%20Unauthorized%20Use%20of%20The%20McGraw%2DHill%20Co
mpanies%20Property%20 

The undersigned has a good faith belief that the use of the
property(ies) in the manners described herein is not authorized by The
McGraw-Hill Companies, its agents or the law.  The information contained
in this notification is accurate.  Under penalty of perjury, the
undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of The McGraw-Hill Companies
with respect to this matter.

Please be advised that this letter is not and is not intended to be a
complete statement of the facts or law as they may pertain to this
matter or of The McGraw-Hill Companies positions, rights or remedies,
legal or equitable, all of which are specifically reserved.  

Regards,

BayTSP, Inc. ::  on behalf of The McGraw-Hill Companies Compliance Team
PO Box 1314 - Los Gatos, CA 95031 aap@copyright-compliance.com
phone: 408-341-2300 fax:  408-341-2399

[A pgp public key is available on the key server at
ldap://keyserver.pgp.com if you would like to verify the authenticity of
this notice.]

Contact BayTSP, authorized agent for The McGraw-Hill Companies, at the
address is listed above or email should you have any concerns or
questions to, Compliance@baytsp.com.  Also please note that this
infringement notice contains an XML tag that can be used to automate the
processing of this data.
